title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, March 6, 2022
description: "What matters in life is not what happens to you but what you remember and how you remember it." --Gabriel García Márquez, born this day in Colombia, 1927.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "What matters in life is not what happens to you but what you remember and how you remember it." --Gabriel García Márquez, born this day in Colombia, 1927.
